markdownRemark.excerpt: Ready to Archive Your Conference’s Videos? Midspace makes it quick and easy to package and export conference content directly to your organization’s YouTube…

children.value: Ready to Archive Your Conference’s Videos?

properties.ariaLabel: Ready to Archive Your Conferences Videos permalink

children.value: Midspace makes it quick and easy to package and export conference content directly to your organization’s YouTube channel.
Exporting presentations from within Midspace can save you a great deal of time as an organizer, by reducing the steps involved in post-event content management.
You may have scheduled pre-recorded videos followed by live Q&As. We recommend combining the pre-recorded video with the Q&A, to form a single video.

With Midspace, you can export videos directly to YouTube - there’s no need to download and re-upload the video files. Midspace’s export also includes subtitles and template-based descriptions to include abstracts, author names and links.
Follow these simple instructions to get started!
Combining videos enables you to stitch together videos, such as a pre-recorded presentation followed by the Q&A recording.
Scroll down the menu to select the items you wish to edit. Select either
or the items from a particular tag.
Use the filtering options to narrow down which videos you wish to combine. A common example is to
to combine pre-recorded presentations with Q&A recordings.
Review the combinations that are about to be generated.
Please note that combining many videos may take Midspace many hours, particularly if any of the videos are long recordings.
. You can now close the page while you wait for the combines to complete.
After combining videos has completed, you can then move on to exporting videos directly to YouTube.
panel in the Midspace admin dashboard.

children.value: We recommend configuring the privacy setting (which determines of each video’s privacy setting in YouTube); the video title and description. A recommended description template is provided below.

properties.style: position: relative; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; max-width: 448px;

padding-bottom: 162.0253164556962%; position: relative; bottom: 0; left: 0; background-image: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,'); background-size: cover; display: block;

children.value: If you are uploading combined videos, we recommend removing the “{{fileName}}” from the video title.
When exporting videos, you are able to select from the list of connected Google/YouTube accounts, as well as upload to specific channels and playlists.
Once you’ve uploaded content to YouTube, you are able to view the full list of videos in Midspace from the
The information listed includes the video YouTube ID, privacy status, and preview with playback ability.

children.value: Now you’re ready to start exporting!

properties.ariaLabel: Now youre ready to start exporting permalink

children.value: Please note: Google currently imposes tight API rate limits that restrict the volume of videos Midspace can export per day (across all our customers). We will provide instruction about managing your export at the end of your conference.
If you need any advice or guidance, please don’t hesitate to contact Midspace.

frontmatter.title: Exporting videos to YouTube
frontmatter.description: Instructions for exporting your videos from Midspace directly into YouTube.
frontmatter.author: Cristal Mojica
